snippet.title: Sands of Aura - Official Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Sands of Aura is an open-world souls-like adventure set within a twilit realm -- buried beneath a sea of sand. Sail across the vast sandseas on the Grainwake and discover how to return life to this dying world through an unrelenting combat system and engaging stories.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1119840/Sands_of_Aura/

#IGN #Gaming #IGNSummerOfGaming
